name: Siege Commander
text: Under your leadership, the time required to assemble and move a siege engine is greatly reduced.
prerequisites: Craft (siege weapon) 5 ranks, Knowledge (engineering) 5 ranks or Profession (siege engineer) 1 rank.
benefit: When you lead a siege engine assembly crew, you grant all of its members a +4 competence bonus on checks to assemble or move the weapon. You also halve the time required to assemble a siege engine.
staminaText: As long as you have at least 1 stamina point in your stamina pool, when you lead a siege engine assembly crew, even those among the crew who are not trained in Craft (siege engine) can take 10 on the check to assemble the siege engine.
text_zh: 在你的指挥下，搬运攻城兵器的耗时被大大缩短了。
prerequisites_zh: 工艺（攻城兵器）5级，知识（工程）5级或专业（攻城技师）1级。
benefit_zh: 当你率领机师组操控攻城兵器时，你为每个成员带来组装或移动兵器的检定+4加值。你还能将组装攻城兵器的耗时减半。
staminaText_zh: 只要你的耐力池中还有至少1点耐力，当你率领攻城器械组装技师团队时，团队中即使有人并没有在工艺（攻城器械）上受训，他们也能在组装攻城器械的检定上取10。
